definition: A term commonly used to refer to a married couple, specifically denoting the union between two individuals who have legally entered into a marital relationship. This term is typically employed to describe the collective identity of a husband and wife, emphasizing their status as a unit within the context of marriage.

examples.german: Die Eheleute sind seit 20 Jahren verheiratet.
examples.english: The married couple has been married for 20 years.
The married couple has two children.

examples.german: Die Eheleute leben in einer gl√ºcklichen Beziehung.
examples.english: The married couple is in a happy relationship.

examples.german: Die Eheleute teilen sich die Hausarbeit.
examples.english: The married couple shares the household chores.
The married couple has common interests.
